name: Work Sucks
description:
Have you ever been a vampire on the hunt for your favorite mug after being fired from your corporate job? Now you can be! Play as Joe Vampire, your typical salary-vampire. He's just been let go from his day job for some reason, but he's not leaving this building without his mug! Help him fight his way to the top with rhythm based combat, defeat his coworkers, and claim the ultimate prize!

How to Play:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Z or Enter to interact with an enemy / select an attack
WASD or Arrow Keys to interact with the combat menu / select an enemy
Z or , to hit the whole beats (square)
C or / to hit the half beats (circle)

Left CTRL to go back

Esc to pause

I for inventory
